summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Image Slider (Diashow) feature. All 7 required features are working correctly - slider loads without JS errors, 5 images present, autoplay at 3s intervals, pagination dots clickable, responsive on all devices, loop enabled, no horizontal scroll issues.
passed_tests: Slider-Komponente l√§dt korrekt ohne JavaScript-Fehler - Swiper 11 loads correctly
5 Bilder sind im Slider enthalten (slide-1.jpg bis slide-5.jpg)
Autoplay funktioniert mit 3000ms delay (alle 3 Sekunden wechselt)
Pagination-Dots sind sichtbar und klickbar (5 bullets, dynamicBullets enabled)
Responsive Design - Desktop (1920x1080), Tablet (768x1024), Mobile (390x844) all working
Loop-Funktion ist aktiviert (loop: true in Swiper config)
Keine horizontalen Scroll-Probleme auf Mobile (overflow-x-hidden verified)
Fade effect with crossFade transition working smoothly
Image Slider has correct data-testid='image-slider' attribute
Gallery section correctly contains ImageSlider component
All 5 images load correctly with proper alt text
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image Slider (Diashow) feature using Swiper 11 is fully implemented and tested. Located in /app/frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.js and integrated in Home.js gallery section. Uses autoplay (3s), fade effect, loop, and pagination with 5 images from /images/background/slide-1.jpg to slide-5.jpg.
